title: Philological Papers
additional-notes: Spot checks of issues from the 1960s and 1970s did not turn up copyright notices.

A 1992 renewal for the 1964 book 'English Poetry of the First World War' by John H. Johnston notes that part of chapter 2 appeared in Philological Papers.  That portion appears to have been published in the December 1961 issue under the title 'Charles Sorley's Bright Promise', and the book renewal would not cover it.

Some issues of this serial may have distinctive titles. Before concluding such issues are in the public domain, search for renewals for books under those titles.  We have not systematically done such searches for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Felice Gollotti for copyright research on this title.
